languages.text: "Вечность отразить непомыслимо, ибо она есть неизбежность".

traits.locale_text: "Вечность отразить непомыслимо, ибо она есть неизбежность".

languages.text: "Eternity cannot be escaped, and therefore cannot conceivably be reflected."
languages.original_text: "Вечность отразить непомыслимо, ибо она есть неизбежность".

traits.locale_text: "Eternity cannot be escaped, and therefore cannot conceivably be reflected."
"Eternity cannot be escaped, and therefore cannot conceivably be reflected."
"Eternity cannot be escaped, and therefore cannot conceivably be reflected."
"Eternity cannot be escaped, and therefore cannot conceivably be reflected."
"Eternity cannot be escaped, and therefore cannot conceivably be reflected."
"Eternity cannot be escaped, and therefore cannot conceivably be reflected."

languages.text: «La eternidad es algo de lo que no se puede salir, y por lo tanto no es posible reflejarla».
languages.original_text: "Eternity cannot be escaped, and therefore cannot conceivably be reflected."

traits.locale_text: «La eternidad es algo de lo que no se puede salir, y por lo tanto no es posible reflejarla».

languages.text: « L'éternité est inéluctable, elle ne peut donc pas avoir de reflet. »
languages.original_text: "Eternity cannot be escaped, and therefore cannot conceivably be reflected."

traits.locale_text: « L'éternité est inéluctable, elle ne peut donc pas avoir de reflet. »

languages.text: 「永遠は逃れられず、それゆえ映し出されることはない」
languages.original_text: "Eternity cannot be escaped, and therefore cannot conceivably be reflected."

traits.locale_text: 「永遠は逃れられず、それゆえ映し出されることはない」

languages.text: “永恒无法逃避，因此也不会有任何倒影。”
languages.original_text: "Eternity cannot be escaped, and therefore cannot conceivably be reflected."

traits.locale_text: “永恒无法逃避，因此也不会有任何倒影。”

languages.text: "Der Ewigkeit kann man nicht entkommen, daher kann sie auch nicht reflektiert werden."
languages.original_text: "Eternity cannot be escaped, and therefore cannot conceivably be reflected."

traits.locale_text: "Der Ewigkeit kann man nicht entkommen, daher kann sie auch nicht reflektiert werden."

languages.text: "Ebediyetten kaçılamaz, dolayısıyla da algılanabilecek şekilde yansıtılamaz."
languages.original_text: "Eternity cannot be escaped, and therefore cannot conceivably be reflected."
